import React from 'react' import './style.scss' interface Offer { title: string description: string oldCost: number cost: number } export default function SubscriptionOffer({ offer }: { offer: Offer }) { return (

{offer.title}

{offer.description}

${offer.oldCost}

${offer.cost}

) }
